school.name: The UKâ€™s Leading Weekend Drama School
school.description: Highly respected teachers from Top UK Drama Schools work alongside specialised Unseen tutors, providing cutting edge courses incorporating techniques such as Meisner, Stanislavski, Laban and Chekhov. We hold monthly showcases as well as live events in venues including Soho House, and Electric Cinema and accept beginner to advanced level.
